fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, International co-operation and development, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Development cooperation in the field of agriculture :  support to farmers' organisations, both strengthening the organisations and giving support to their activities.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
AGRICORD is the alliance of agri-agencies. 
 
It is composed of 12 members:  
Afdi (FNSEA, APCA, JA, CNMCCA), France 
Agriterra (LTO, SSVO, NCR and NAJK), The Netherlands 
AsiaDHRRA (Asian Farmers Association), Asia 
Asprodeb (CNCR), Senegal 
AHA/DBV Deutscher Bauernverband, Germany 
CSA (Fédération Wallonne de l’Agriculture), Belgium 
FFD (MTK, SLC, ProAgria Centres, Pellervo-Seura), Finland 
Fert (Groupe Céréaliers de France (AGPB, AGPM, ARVALIS, UNIGRAINS), France 
TRIAS (Boerenbond, Landelijke Gilden, KVLV and KLJ), Belgium 
ACODEA/UPA Union de Pequeños Agricultores y Ganaderos + Fademur, Spain 
UPA-DI (Union of Agricultural Producers), Quebec, Canada 
WE EFFECT (LRF Federation of Swedish Farmers), Sweden 
 
And of 1 associated member: 
CIA Confederazione Italiana Agricoltori, Italy
goals__remit:
Created in 2003, AGRICORD is the alliance of agri-agencies, organisations for international cooperation with main objective to support the strengthening of agricultural and rural organisations from developing countries, and with a mandate of agricultural and rural membership organisations in its own country (OCDE countries). 
Since 2007, AGRICORD operates "Farmers Fighting for Poverty", a programme aiming at strenghtening farmers' organisations in developing countries.
